title: Reflective Thinking Enhancement Program for Design Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in administrative management tasks
context.additional_context: Program systematically training reflective thinking through design problem-solving activities based on real workplace scenarios in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain decision-making rationales by applying reflective thinking at three stages (initial/intermediate/final) of the design process
Learners can analyze mathematical modeling issues encountered in VR simulations from at least two perspectives (procedural/conceptual) and derive improvement plans
Learners can write reflective journals evaluating their design approaches at three levels (technical/strategic/philosophical) based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
